name: Trout Slayer
description: Trout Slayer is a filtered wheat ale, fermented at cool temperatures, making it a smooth drinkable session beer. Brewed with Palisade, Glacier, and Mt. Hood hops, this straw colored beer is sure to please any craft beer drinker. IBU 35 SRM 5 ABV 4.7%
style: Light American Wheat Ale or Lager
